```{r}
W<-rnorm(1000)
X<-numeric(1000)
X1<-numeric(1000)
X2<-numeric(1000)
for(t in 2:1000)
  X[t]<-1/2*W[t-1]+W[t]
for(t in 2:1000)
  X1[t]<-X[t-1]
for(t in 3:1000)
  X2[t]<-X[t-2]
cov(X,X2) #gama 0
# cov(X,X1) #gama 1
ts.plot(X)
```
